cpa.games.board.oxo
Class OXOTextGame

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--cpa.games.board.oxo.OXOTextGame
public class OXOTextGame
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a simple version of the OXO game, made to quickly test the OXOEngine.
It's far from perfect (I mean, everything is static - grrr)

Website

http://www.schilduil.be/javadoc/cpa/games/board/oxo/OXOTextGame.html
